about_the_game:
Mario Meatballs has always yearned to create the ultimate pizzeria, and now that he's found a spot within his budget, his dream has become a reality. But there's a reason why the real estate was such a steal...

In this thrilling pizza-making simulation with a dash of tower defense, you'll step into Mario's shoes and manage every aspect of running a brick-and-mortar shop by day then at night fend off hordes of crazed lunatics and other totally normal things for a small business owner.  




Key Features
■ Multi-Leveled Puzzles and Challenges: Engaging gameplay loops that include cooking simulations, tower defense strategies, competitive multiplayer modes, and team-based challenges.
■ Multiplayer Co-op: Challenge your friendships by playing against them or play on the same side and upgrade your shop to the best of your crews abilities
■ OST: Original Soundtrack and sound effects crafted by Brightside Movement, enhancing the culinary adventure.
■ Immersive Graphics: AAA-quality graphics create a vibrant and delicious world where players can truly experience the art of pizza making and tomatoe sauce spilling

content_descriptors.notes: At night players have to protect their pizza shop from angry customers that are attacking the store. There is cartoon blood splatters and other forms of fantasy violence that takes place during hand-to-hand combat

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i4
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: ANY

short_description: Manage the shop by day, serving customers and keeping everything afloat, by night fend off hordes of crazed lunatics and handle unexpected challenges that come with being a small business owner. Enjoy a mix of cooking simulations, tower defense, and multiplayer co-op in this unique pizza adventure.
